channel.title: I can't run my client error
channel.description:
[code]Bloodbarrage client are running Java is not recognised as internal or external task, programme or batchbestand. [/code]
alright, i have windows vista, latest jdk/java
any answers :D?

item.title: I can't run my client error
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

open your run.bat in notepad delete everything end add this in place :

@echo off JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause

save end press on run.bat your client will run now

Read full topic
item.source: I can't run my client error

item.title: I can't run my client error
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

Paths/Classpaths.

Edit your run.bat with your current java
